name: Lucky Charms
description:
LuckyCharms is a fast-paced platformer-sidescroller, where you play as a leprechaun with impressive jumping abilities, trying to get as many charms of good luck as possible.

The game also includes hard and endless modes, and a bunch of achievements for increased replayability!

This game was made as a submittion for the Weekly Game Jam for the theme of "Good Luck", and though I had some last-second troubles (literally) in publishing it, I'm very happy with the result.

Have fun!
